name: Hydro Hunter
description: Defeat every type of Hydro Mimic that an Oceanid can summon.

name: Dip, Duck, Dive, Dodge, Defeat
description: Defeat an Oceanid without being hit by water bombs left behind by certain Hydro Mimics.

name: Extreme Gardening
description: Paralyze a Cryo Regisvine by attacking its corolla.

name: Gardener Extraordinaire
description: Paralyze a Pyro Regisvine by attacking its corolla.

name: Geronimo!
description: Hit an opponent with a Plunging Attack after plunging for more than 5 seconds.

name: Shield Me From the World
description: Have a single character be protected by 3 different types of shield at once.
